Name: Finding Lumber
Author: TangleFire360
SendMessage.&4&l[name]: Oh? Hello new friend!

Dialog.&4&l[name]: Looking for wood are you? Well I can help with that.
There's wood all over the place here, and in all different types!
Say, why don't you explore and find out where all the different wood is?

SendMessage.&4&l[name]: What do you mean you don't need wood!? Everyone needs wood!
But if you're fine with only using what you pick up from those annoying goblins then okay...
Come talk to me again if you want to learn where different woods are.
Ah good, then why don't you go get some oak logs?
You should figure out where it all is by the time you have &4&l32 Oak Logs&f.
Wait you don't know where the oak is around here!?
It's quite literally all over the place! The miners use it some to prop up their tunnels.
You should be able to find &4&l32 Oak Logs&f if you just look around here some.
That wasn't too hard was it?
Another common wood to find around here is acacia.
Go get &4&l32 Acacia Logs&f and come back, shouldn't take you too long.
That's not enough for you to have found &4&l32 Acacia Logs&f
It's all around the walls of these mines, the miners complain about running into wood all the time!
Blends in doesn't it? You must have good eyes.
But now it gets a little harder, the other four types of wood aren't as easy to get in large amounts.
Don't believe me? Go get &4&l32 Dark Oak Logs&f then.
Couldn't find it ey?
Well, some of the mining equipment is made of dark oak logs, but if you don't want to destroy those then try over by the pit.
Straight ahead, right next to one of those pesky Bone Snipers, you can get &4&l32 Dark Oak Logs&f there easily.
Looks like you found it!
Half-way my friend, and I'll even cut you some slack and send you after spruce next.
Find &4&l32 Spruce Logs&f, and don't be afraid to grab a few extra if you want.
Huh, I thought if you could find all the others you could find spruce too.
Here I'll give you a hint.
Try looking up around this area with the portal.
You should be able to reach a few of those trees and get &4&l32 Spruce Logs&f.
There may be some other spots with spruce, but those must be deeper in the mines.
Speaking of going deeper in the mines...
Birch and jungle wood are guarded a little more heavily than the other woods.
If you haven't already, you may want to talk to Jerry in your kingdom about making some tools with the wood you have so far.
Once you're ready, go find &4&l32 Birch Logs&f.
And now you see why I told you to get some tools first right?
If you want to save some time, try going to the pond.
Careful, you have to go past the pit to get there, and the pond is dangerous.
After all, that's where we found Rick's body when he got killed by that golden chicken...
Don't worry though, you only need to collect &4&l32 Birch Logs&f, so you shouldn't be there too long.
Almost done friend!
I've asked a lot of you, but trust me you'll thank me for it later.
There's only one more type of wood, jungle, and it's pretty deep in the mines too.
Go find the jungle wood and get &4&l32 Jungle Logs&f.
Haven't found it yet? Don't feel too bad about that.
There's only one spot in these mines with jungle wood, in the tunnels over by the pond.
And if you thought surviving the pond was hard, there are almost always three or four goblins by the jungle wood.
I get that &4&l32 Jungle Logs&f can be a lot, but it isn't too bad with a trusty axe in your hand!
Hey you got it!
Congrats! You've gotten a good haul of wood for your wood-based needs, and learned something along the way.
What's that look for? Is there an easier way to get wood?
well, if you go to Nicole's Artisan Shop in the hub, she sells leaves.
If you get lucky, you can get a sapling by breaking just a few leaves, but it can take quite a few sometimes.
It gets really expensive really quick if you're not lucky, so it's always good to know where you can find wood around here.
Oh yeah, here's a little something to help you store all that wood you've collected.
